title: SR announcer voiceover packs - Riot pls answer
body:
With the current addition of the Bilgewater themed VO pack, Riot, you should keep the voiceover packs as an option!
Custom VO packs are already in use for some and others seem to enjoy listening to different announcers
There could be possibilities of unlockable event VO packs for the future or random shop bought VO packs 

Riot make it happen please!

replies.body: Please if there is a god this will happen!
The only VO pack I'd pay for is Valor.

Honestly i'm mostly just annoyed that the current GP announcer over rides my announcer pack.

For that reason i'll be glad when the event is done.
People like yourself would line up for Riot's turds, so they probably will .
